footer.description: The open-source platform for autonomous, brand-aligned content creation.

brandLearning.title: An AI That Knows Your Brand Better Than an Intern
brandLearning.description: ContentaGen performs a deep analysis of your website and brand documents to build a unique "Brand Brain." This ensures every piece of content perfectly captures your voice, style, and business objectivesâ€”eliminating endless revisions.

website.title: Learns From Your Website
website.description: Our system crawls your entire website to understand your business, products, and messaging, forming the foundation of its knowledge.

voice.title: Captures Your Voice & Style
voice.description: AI agents identify your unique tone, terminology, and stylistic patterns to create a brand voice profile that guides all content creation.

knowledge.title: Creates a Knowledge Hub
knowledge.description: All your brand knowledge is indexed into a central repository, giving your AI agents instant, accurate recall for perfectly consistent content.

community.title: Build the Future of Content, Together.
community.description: Join our Discord community to connect with the core team, get priority support, share what you're building, and help shape the future of ContentaGen.
